measured_by: OECD surveys of confidence and trust in institutions
justification: The article notes that “International surveys of confidence and trust in institutions carried out by entities such as the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD, 2024) show declines in general confidence in institutions,” directly linking the construct of institutional trust to the OECD survey instrument.
construct: confidence in institutions / trust in institutions
